Author: alynichelle
Text: Ohh not really from the right point of view I guess, but I’ve worked in retail in general for a while. So I have always learned to be patient with people. If they’re being negative towards you at all it’s their own issue to deal with. They don’t know if maybe you could have an allergy or something of that sort. Or just possibly say that at checkout if you feel the need.  Good Luck, I always have this feeling but it’s been getting better knowing it’s their issue not mine.

Author: RoknaBlue
Text: yes!!!!! whenever i walk into a gas station idk why but i spend foreverrrr just looking at the candy bars reading labels lol  which is probably not good bc you have to flip the little tab thing to read the calories so it looks like you're trying to open it which is super embarrassing but i cannot control myself   and after i do that i always end up just buying like 4 blue rasberry bangs & a 24 oz coke 0 and i swear the looks i have gotten from those cashiers make me want to die
